overview: The 2007 Boost Mobile Pro at Lower Trestles features 8X World Champion Kelly Slater dominating the field against the toughest competition yet! Old school, new school and the current crop of WCT talent step it up, but eventually fall short to perennial dominator Slater and darkhorse Pancho Sullivan. Early rounds see heated action with Young Guns Dane Reynolds and Jeremy Flores, Chris Ward, Bobby Martinez, Josh Kerr and Bruce Irons facing off against Mick Fanning Cory Lopez and Occy. South African powerhouse Jordy Smith takes out Joel Parkinson and Andy Irons defeats Sunny Garcia. The Quarter Finals include one of the best match-ups ever, with Slater defeating Taylor Knox in flawless Lowers perfection.
title: Friend or Foe
